channel.title: PostGIS on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in PostGIS on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Create a new corona infection site map [FastAPI/PostGIS/deck.gl(React)] (Data processing)
item.description: New Corona... The spread of infection is not stopping... I was thinking that I would like to put some data on a map and visualize it as a fledgling GIS shop, but I was afraid that most of the open data was collected in PDF format. But! ! ! ! ! ! For non-profit purposes, sites that provide wonderful data with free data duplication, quotation, and reprint (https://gis.jag-japan.com/covid19jp/, so I would like to use this data to express it on the map!

item.title: [Python] Aim GIS Master #1 Extract Road NW from OpenStreetMap
item.description: #I am still dissatisfied with the accuracy of GPS on smartphones Nowadays you can easily perform GPS logging on your smartphone, After all, there are some errors. The following is the track of the vehicle traveled by MyTracks (Is it no longer usable?) People can see where they ran, but I can’t manage to make a beautiful track… However, I do not have data such as G sensor and steering, and even if there is it, it seems difficult for an amateur to correct it.
